title: Patch Notes
content: y. Fixed some cases where the night would literally never end (careful what you wish for) because a party member not in the active party was in a dialogue while everyone else was snoozin'. Fixed some characters who were stuck in Wild Shape form. Fixed a dialogue flow issue where asking Shadowheart about the fight with Lae'zel would make her talk about Astarion. Focus, Shadowheart. Fixed a case where the non-summoned version of Scratch had no dialogue at camp. Balance is restored. Fixed an issue
